trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"> </xref> dirigerade händelser, samt relaterade ansluten och förhandsgranska händelser.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: Den här händelseklassen data används med följande bifogade händelser:- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>händelse dataklassen används också med följande dirigerade händelser för grundläggande element.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Dessa dirigerade händelser vidarebefordra ovanstående bifogade händelser för att göra dem mer tillgänglig för generella elementet modellen i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>Bifogade händelser och baselementet dirigerade händelser dela sina händelsedata och den genomströmning och tunnlar versioner av dirigerade händelser också dela händelsedata.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Detta kan påverka hanterade egenskaperna för händelsen som transporteras skapades.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [indata översikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `true` in the event data), keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>händelse eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>händelsen hanterats (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> är inställd på `true` i informationen om händelsen), ändras inte tangentbordsfokus.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> event or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> event is handled, keyboard focus will not change.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>händelse eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>händelsen hanteras, tangentbordsfokus ändras inte.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den logiska tangentbord enheten som är associerade med den här händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Tidpunkten då indata inträffade.

trans-unit.source: The element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: Det element som tidigare hade fokus.

trans-unit.source: The element that now has focus.
trans-unit.target: Elementet har som nu fokus.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Anropar händelsehanterare på ett sätt för typspecifika, vilket kan öka effektiviteten för händelsen system.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen kastar generiska hanteraren som en <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>och aktiverar det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den här implementeringen mönstret och skälen för den finns <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>och [dirigerade händelser översikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Allmän hanteraren att anropa på typspecifika sätt.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: Målet att anropa hanteraren.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that focus has moved to.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det element som fokus har flyttats till.

trans-unit.source: The element with focus.
trans-unit.target: Element i fokus.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that previously had focus.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det element som tidigare hade fokus.

trans-unit.source: The previously focused element.
trans-unit.target: Tidigare fokuserad element.
